Duration for Google Tasks: Elevate Your Task Management Experience!

Transform the way you manage tasks in Google Calendar with Duration for Google Tasks, a simple yet powerful Chrome extension that streamlines your scheduling process. This tool automatically adjusts the height of tasks in Google Calendar based on the duration specified in your task titles, providing a clearer and more intuitive overview of your schedule.

Key Features
Dynamic Task Height Adjustment: Automatically resizes task blocks according to the duration specified (e.g., 1h, 30min, 1.5h). This visual representation makes it easier to allocate your time effectively and spot overlaps in your schedule.

Clean Calendar Display: Seamlessly hides time information (e.g., 1h, 30min) from task titles in Google Calendar while preserving it in Google Tasks. This keeps your calendar visually tidy and focused on essential details.

Responsive Design: Task heights recalibrate whenever you resize your browser window, ensuring consistent visuals across all screen sizes for an optimal user experience.

How It Works
To get started, simply add the duration in parentheses to your task title in Google Calendar (e.g., "Create Product Requirements Doc(1.5h)"). Duration for Google Tasks will automatically adjust the height of the task block to reflect your specified duration, making your calendar more organized and visually appealing.
